Zhidan county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi

sentences.english: Zhidan Yuan Sluice Site is an important archeological discovery in Shanghai in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 志丹苑遗址是近年来上海的一项重要考古发现。

sentences.english: Zhidan oil-field is located in the east of Shanbei Slope of the Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 志丹地区地处鄂尔多斯盆地陕北斜坡东部。

sentences.english: "Gan" in Zhidan dialect of Northern Shaanxi is both an auxiliary verb and a degree adverb.
sentences.chinese: 陕北志丹方言中的“敢”既是助动词，又是测度副词。
